```py
>>> np.random.seed(42)
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randn(20, 3),
...                   columns=['a', 'b', 'c'])
>>> df.loc[df.index[:5], 'a'] = np.nan
>>> df.loc[df.index[5:10], 'b'] = np.nan
>>> df.cov(min_periods=12)
 a         b         c
a  0.316741       NaN -0.150812
b       NaN  1.248003  0.191417
c -0.150812  0.191417  0.895202 
```
